analysis.description: FreezableToken.toKey (/unique_chucks/14/0x1175d9094e821d703971714946e7f02de7525f8b.sol#629-645) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/14/0x1175d9094e821d703971714946e7f02de7525f8b.sol:
	Contract Checkable has payable functions:
	 - check (/unique_chucks/14/0x1175d9094e821d703971714946e7f02de7525f8b.sol#1095-1104)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
empty in ERC223Token.transfer (/unique_chucks/14/0x1175d9094e821d703971714946e7f02de7525f8b.sol#896) is a local variable never initialiazed

	-MainToken(token).mint(addresses[i],amounts[i]) (/unique_chucks/14/0x1175d9094e821d703971714946e7f02de7525f8b.sol#1217)

TemplateCrowdsale.init has external calls inside a loop:
	- MainToken(token).mint(addresses[i],amounts[i]) (/unique_chucks/14/0x1175d9094e821d703971714946e7f02de7525f8b.sol#1217)

TemplateCrowdsale.init has external calls inside a loop:
	- MainToken(token).mintAndFreeze(addresses[i],amounts[i],freezes[i]) (/unique_chucks/14/0x1175d9094e821d703971714946e7f02de7525f8b.sol#1218-1222)

Reentrancy in TemplateCrowdsale.init (/unique_chucks/14/0x1175d9094e821d703971714946e7f02de7525f8b.sol#1193-1222):
	External calls:
	- MainToken(token).pause() (/unique_chucks/14/0x1175d9094e821d703971714946e7f02de7525f8b.sol#1197-1200)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- owner (/unique_chucks/14/0x1175d9094e821d703971714946e7f02de7525f8b.sol)

FreezableToken.releaseOnce (/unique_chucks/14/0x1175d9094e821d703971714946e7f02de7525f8b.sol#590-614) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(uint64(block.timestamp) > head) (/unique_chucks/14/0x1175d9094e821d703971714946e7f02de7525f8b.sol#597-600)

FreezableToken.releaseAll (/unique_chucks/14/0x1175d9094e821d703971714946e7f02de7525f8b.sol#618-629) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- release != 0 && block.timestamp > release (/unique_chucks/14/0x1175d9094e821d703971714946e7f02de7525f8b.sol#623-629)

FreezableToken.freeze (/unique_chucks/14/0x1175d9094e821d703971714946e7f02de7525f8b.sol#646-678) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_until > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/14/0x1175d9094e821d703971714946e7f02de7525f8b.sol#650-653)
